data.name: Idol Hunter : Hentai
data.detailed_description:
Idol Hunter — is a story about hacker who earns money by hacking idols. At your service there are dossiers of several girls with different destinies and fetishes. Crack them and obtain their nude photos for customer, find out their mysteries and keep their pics as a marvelous bonus.

GamePlay:



Here is a program code in which you need to find errors. In the right corner there is a task that describes which characters you need to find.As soon as you find all the errors in the code you get the desired result :)


Features:

  • Colorful animated CG-arts
  • Each idol has their own fetishes demonstrated in their hacked material.
  • Pleasant soundtracks
  • Mini-game
  • Your own gallery with pretty nudes

data.short_description: Idol Hunter is a story about hacker who earns money by hacking idols. At your service there are dossiers of several girls with different destinies and fetishes. Crack them and obtain their nude photos for customer, find out their mysteries and keep their pics as a marvelous bonus.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 450
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 650
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content that is not suitable for all ages or for viewing at work: Nudity or scenes of a sexual nature, Sexual content for adults only.
